review: You can't beat the price and you get so much for the value.
author: John J. Bogle "history buff"

review: Very disappointed. Product was unlike Roku. When registering, on screen directions constantly asked for credit card information.
author: Bobby Walker

review: Waiting for to register it so it will work for me.
author: K. Smith "raggedysam"

review: Great.  Love having more to watch than regular TV.
author: ivorine

review: Easy to install comes In a Tiny package. It's perfect for my son's room. He can Netflix, or buy a Amazon instant movie. Love it!
author: Jetska

review: Unit works fine, interface is a little clunky. My internet speed doesn't allow HD very often, but that is not Fire Stick's fault. I like the variety of content available.
author: Thomas W. Ingwalson

review: I still think I prefer the roku slightly (box not stick) but that may just be familiarity as I have no complaints
author: Danny g
